doc:
Doug McClure https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Doug_McClure 0 Douglas Osborne McClure (May 11, 1935 – February 5, 1995) was an American actor whose career in film and television extended from the 1950s to the 1990s. He is best known for his role as the cowboy Trampas during the entire run from 1962 to 1971 of the NBC Western series, The Virginian, loosely based on the Owen Wister novel. Douglas_Osborne_McClure ( May_11_,_1935 – February_5_,_1995 ) was an_American_actor whose_career in film_and_television extended from the_1950s to the_1990s . He is_best_known for his_role as the_cowboy Trampas during the_entire_run from 1962 to 1971 of the_NBC_Western_series , The_Virginian , loosely_based on the_Owen_Wister_novel .
